data.title: Top Gun's Kelly McGillis Marries Longtime Girlfriend in Civil Union
data.text:
Top Gunactress Kelly McGillis and longtime girlfriend Melanie Leis were joined in a civil union, her rep told TVGuide.com.

The ceremony for McGillis, 53, and Leis, a 42-year-old sales executive, was held Wednesday at the Collingswood, N.J., Municipal Court. The couple met in 2000. Leis, who now works for a company that provides Muzak to businesses, was an employee at a Key West, Fla., restaurant owned by McGillis and her second husband Fred Tillman.

See other celebs who got married this year

Last year, Ms. McGillis announced she was a lesbian. Discussing that interview, Ms. McGillis told the Times: "That was one of those moments when somebody asked me a question, my kids had gone from home, so I really didn't have to protect anyone by skirting the question, and I just decided to be absolutely honest."
